member.returns: A parser that is the opposite of the given parser.

member.name: M:Hl7.FhirPath.Sprache.Parse.OptimizeRegex(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Optimize the regex by only matching successfully at the start of the input. Do this by wrapping the whole regex in non-capturing parentheses preceded by a `^'.
member.remarks: This method is invoked via reflection in unit tests. If renamed, the tests will need to be modified or they will fail.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.Source
member.summary: A Source is a descriptor for source code. It is returned from the debug adapter as part of a StackFrame and it is used by clients when specifying breakpoints.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.Source.Name
member.summary: The short name of the source.
member.remarks: Every source returned from the debug adapter has a name. When sending a source to the debug adapter this name is optional.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.Source.Path
member.summary: The path of the source to be shown in the UI.
member.remarks: It is only used to locate and load the content of the source if no sourceReference is specified (or its value is 0).

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.Source.SourceReference
member.summary: Id for the source.
member.remarks: If sourceReference > 0 the contents of the source must be retrieved through the SourceRequest (even if a path is specified). A sourceReference is only valid for a session, so it must not be used to persist a source.

member.summary: The source line of the breakpoint or logpoint.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.SourceBreakpoint.Column
member.summary: An optional source column of the breakpoint.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.SourceBreakpoint.Condition
member.summary: An optional expression for conditional breakpoints.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame
member.summary: Source location and other details about a stackframe.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame.Id
member.summary: An identifier for the stack frame.
member.remarks: It must be unique across all threads. This id can be used to retrieve the scopes of the frame with the 'scopesRequest' or to restart the execution of a stackframe.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame.Name
member.summary: The name of the stack frame, typically a method name.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame.Source
member.summary: The optional source of the frame.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame.Line
member.summary: The line within the file of the frame.
member.remarks: If source is null or doesn't exist, line is 0 and must be ignored.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Language.Debugging.StackFrame.Column
member.summary: The column within the line.
member.remarks: If source is null or doesn't exist, column is 0 and must be ignored.
